entry.title: Paranoid
entry.content:
Monday

I don’t know how I want to format these posts yet, so I’ll just fill these lines with whatever I desire.
I was dissapointed by the solar eclipse today, the entire حدث (event) what a bore. The earth was slighlty grayer, but that’s all it was. I find it weird theres a big ball of fire in the sky we aren’t allowed to look at. I don’t have much to write, as aforementioned this is my first time.

Today I learned that if you constantly find yourself smiling around those around you, then those people are for life.

Tuesday

After 29 days and 29 nights I am free. Fasting is deceptive. It seems easy at first, but many realize that the real challenge is continuing to fast for around 30 days. I took for granted being able to indulge myself with food. Never again will I mock those who are emanciated. I don’t have the faintest idea of what else I could write about, but I hope that over these next few weeks, I ameliorate my writing skills and learn to express myself more.

Today I learned that hunger is more than than a biological deficit, it also affects the mind.

Wednesday

Today is عيد الفطر. I prepared myself for a feast accordingly, and worse my best clothes. This year eid felt different. I was compressed between 2 kids and had to escape quickly before I became flatened. I remember that life is not meant for us to only work but to also enjoy ourselves and have fun. I am once again incapable of writing anything else.

Today I learned how grief-stricken someone must feel if they were to lose their kids.

Thursday

[Empty]

Friday

[Empty]

I guess I wasn’t able to finish this week. School simply takes a huge cut from my time, leaving me with no time left to work on this blog. I hope as the days go by, I’ll have more time to write. As of right now, my writing ability is terrible and I am still trying to improve every day.
entry.summary:
Monday

I don’t know how I want to format these posts yet, so

entry.title: Welcome
entry.content:
I pushed this project back way too far.

Reason for creation

I wanted a place where I could share my myself with the world, and a blog is the perfect medium for that. This my first time writing in my free time, so I don’t know what to put here. I wish to share my writings with you (poems, haikus, etc.) and talk about any skills I’ve been developing, or any other projects I’m working on.

I also want to share any pictures or videos I take, and any beats I make. I hope to continue to update this blog, even after I graduate from high school.

If anyone will even really read this, welcome and I hope you enjoy.
entry.summary: I pushed this project back way too far.

entry.title: Sticks
